right!?"},{"lineNumber":134545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":134546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、第一軍から第四軍を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, send the them.\""},{"lineNumber":134548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?"},{"lineNumber":134549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　第一軍から第四軍……全てですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"First through fourth armies... all of them?\""},{"lineNumber":134550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「合わせると74万の軍勢で……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Combined that's 740,000 number...\""},{"lineNumber":134553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回、失敗は許されん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Failure is not an option this castle.\""},{"lineNumber":134555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すぐに向かわせろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Send them understood.\""},{"lineNumber":134557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬ァーーーーー鹿。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot."},{"lineNumber":134558,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それじゃあ足んねぇよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That won't be enough.\""},{"lineNumber":134559,"originalJapaneseLine":"走りだそうとした魔物兵をケイブリスが止める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kvebris stops the demon soldier who was about to run off."},{"lineNumber":134560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人共を使う」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We'll use the demons.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の方が今、緊急事態だって分かんねぇか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you understand that *I'm* the one in an emergency right now!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、その、ですが、こちらも緊急でして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-well, it's just that we're in an emergency too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが割って入る。
その護衛達が魔物界に侵入してきました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their guards have invaded the demon world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「加えて、ホーネットやサテラなど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In addition, traitors among the demons like Hornet and Satela seem to be with them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の裏切り者も一緒の模様で……」
こんな時に来やがるとはよぉぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shows up at a time like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 撤退の用意は……出来てますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are prepared to retreat... but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……てめぇ、こら？　今なんつった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You there, what did you just say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラさんが悲しむだろうがァァァアー！」
「カミーラさんの意向と誕生パーティーは
全てにおいて優先される！　分かったか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must be prioritized above all else! Got it!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かったら復唱しやがれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you understand, repeat it back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラ様の意向と誕生パーティーは
全てにおいて優先されますぅぅー！」
てめぇは分かってんだろうな！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, send the first through fourth armies

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第一軍から第四軍……全てですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First through fourth armies... all of them?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入してきた人間共は、その……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Failure is not an option this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に奴らをこの城に近づけるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely do not let those bastards near this castle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃあ足んねぇよ」
走りだそうとした魔物兵をケイブリスが止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kvebris stops the demon soldier who was about to run off.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、その、ですが、こちらも緊急でして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-well, it's just that we're in an emergency too...

その護衛達が魔物界に侵入してきました！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we are prepared to retreat... but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……てめぇ、こら？　今なんつった？」

全てにおいて優先される！　分かったか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must be prioritized above all else! Got it!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かったら復唱しやがれ！」

てめぇは分かってんだろうな！」
